phrases: The only creatures in Edolas who have magic power inside them...
The reason we could not use magic was because of the unease in our hearts!
we knew that wizards from Earthland have magic power inside their bodies.
But that magic power cannot be compared to the Exceeds...
So that girl named Lucy also has magic power in her body?
Then killing her is, whoa, such a waste!
We have orders to eliminate her from Queen Chagot of the Exceeds.
But, whoa, it is such a waste!
Furthermore, it is still impossible with our technology to extract magic power from human bodies.
Then, what will we do with those two Dragon Slayers?
Those are human, and yet not human.
If the experiment is a success,
we could get our hands on a near-infinite supply of magic power.
And just in case, speed up the magic power extraction from the Earthland lacrima.
In just a bit, this world might get magic power back!
It will be a great thing.
What will you do first, Sugar Boy?
What is the matter, Panther Lily?
Your Highness, it is about the recent military buildup...
Happy and Carla are a race called the Exceed.
On this world, they are like angels.
And their Queen Chagot is God.
The word of God is law, and it is her job to regulate humanity.
If her mouth says die, that human has no choice but to die.
How unfair of a law can you get?
You have researched this world quite well, I see.
I am impressed you can still put on such a brave face.
You do understand the position you are in, yes?
They are just like the Erza I know, so I could not help but feel a little at ease...
In our world, you are a member of Fairy Tail!
You are strong, and cool... and a little bit scary.
But everyone really depends on you.
You also love sweets and cute clothes, and are actually quite girly!
Sorry, but I am not the Erza you know.
I just want to save my friends, that is all!
You might be a different person, that is true.
But I can tell you are the same deep down!
You are not a person that can laugh at people's suffering!
Erza would never do this to someone who was not resisting!
She could never do this, no way!
People's suffering is my favorite dish!
You realize why I am called the Fairy Hunter?
I have killed countless members of Fairy Tail.
How dare you say those things in Erza's voice, with Erza's face!
We are here to save you!
Seems like it was a problem with our hearts.
It is been so long, I misjudged and gave it too much of a boost...
What is the meaning of this?
This individual was ordered to be eliminated by the Queen!
But even if it comes directly from an Exceed,
you should not have the authority to reverse an order from the Queen!
Please hand that woman over to me.
It is I, Princess Carla, daughter of Queen Chagot!
Where is Wen- are the two Dragon Slayers?
The basement of the west tower.
I do not have the authority to do that.
I do not care, just do it!
Erza, those two Exceeds are Fallen!
They have been chased out of Extalia!
There were not any Exceeds that were all buff like that!
Wait, were not you a princess?
Two Fallen have escaped with a prisoner!
The Fallen Exceeds are blue and white!
It is our fault that you were caught.
But then you went and saved me.
I am telling you, I am not angry one bit!
Anyway, I am shocked to hear you are the daughter of the Queen?
I did not know that either.
It was just a bluff, obviously.
Why are you making that face, Happy?
Oh, I just thought, That is the Carla I know.
Did she just call him Happy?
Right now, we have to hurry and find Wendy.
She said the two were being held in the basement.
What are you smiling about, Lucy?
Is not that the west tower?
It is a flock of cats!
It is dangerous in the air!
Let us land on solid ground!
There is enemies on the ground, too!
Lucy, what about your Celestial Magic?
This sticky stuff seems to block my magic!
What is the meaning of this?
The Extalia Royal Guard has come chasing after two Fallen!
He activated the Territorial Security Last Defense Operation?
We will head inside a building!
Why are they aiming at the Exceed?
Exceeds are like angels or gods to humans, right?
I do not really know, but it seems like our best course of action is to use the confusion.
We will go save Wendy and Natsu while we have the chance!
The Fallen and the prisoner have...
They should be heading toward the west tower!
The Queen will not stay silent on this!
The Exceeds turned into a lacrima!
We have really done it now...
There are no gods in this world!
Only we humans suffer from limited magic power!
All the while, the Exceed revel in their infinite magic power!
Why can we not obtain that infinity so near to us?
I proclaim the end to the era where we are controlled!
Everything is for the future of humanity!
For creating a prosperous magic society!
So this is why he was building up the military?
If we can steal the Exceeds' magic power, our kingdom can obtain an infinite supply.
Your Highness, the Queen is coming to attack!
The military might of Extalia is incredible!
I captured the Dragon Slayers precisely for this time.
Now is the time we must cast down the gods.
Hurry and extract their Dragon Slayer Magic.
Are you two prepared for this?
Things have really gotten crazy, it seems.
I cannot believe that the humans and the Exceeds have started a war!
It does not have anything to do with us.
They can fight all they want, I do not care.
You will not be going any further.
Were not you going to leave us alone for now?
You took a direct hit from my magic.
And yet you are still alive?
But this will be your end.
I never received an order to capture you alive.
I will strike the final blow!
I was so close to saving you, but...
It looks like this is as far as I get.
Natsu would never give up, no matter what.
Both of you have considerable magic power.
And do not you dare give up on me!
We will get out of this, for sure!
I am sure our friends will come for us, right?
Both of you do not know when to quit, do you?
Is that part of the toughness of being a Dragon Slayer?
Do not you ever give up!
Next up it will be your turn!
I will give you my magic power in Wendy's place!
We are basically completely trapped here.
There is probably a very tight guard around Wendy and Natsu.
Even if we wanted to, we could not get close.
Even though we made it this far...
Natsu never gave up, no matter what happened!
He is made it this far by always fighting through to the end!
And now it is our turn to learn from Natsu!
Do you have some kind of plan?
Do not let him get away!
Have one sacrifice himself, and rescue them when the guard is weakened...
I figured you would try something like that.
What the hell are you doing to Natsu and Wendy?
We are stealing the magic power we need for Code ETD from them.
Your devil's luck just ran out.
I will not let you lay a hand on Carla!
You did this knowing they are members of our guild?
We will never forgive those who lay hands on our fellow guild members!
All of you are now our enemies!
Why are you so shaken up?
There are two Erzas, and what is more, they are fighting each other!
It is the end of this world!
Do you think he will listen to a thing I say?
You are always like this, Natsu.
Being shaken up sure works up an appetite!
